name: Be A RockStar ★
description:
★★★

Hey!

You Want To Be a Rockstar★?

If your answer is yes, this game will make you a rockstar! (if not you will learn how to be a rockstar:))

It is a puzzle game. So you have to make the right decisions. 

Relax, I hope you can find them easily! (So, a rockstar should not play computer games to become a rockstar, right?)

It is quick (about 5 min. gameplay) and "How to Play" file is inside.

I hope you enjoy this game!

★★★
